game_description: This is a DEMO including two exercise VR Fencing Trainer Combines a Virtual or Real Eppie Rapier and Saber with Virtual Exercises A game complex of exercises aimed at reaction and attention. The athlete learns and practice to attack and defend with sets of challenges. Muscle memory and motor skills are formed through practice and repetition of exercises in VR with a real or virtual blade
review_1: It’s good for basics and aim, but since it hasn’t finished development you can’t actually fence someone, as an experienced foil ist and a beginner sabre I think there is a lot of room for improvement
review_2: This can be awesome. Please bring full version
review_3: I have been waiting for this! A fencing game! It’s not really a game but I like the graphics. Giving you 5 star even tho this is not a 5 star game! Please add features. PvP would be awesome! Just detecting the hit would be enough
review_4: This is such a boring game there is no pvp or anything like it pls add a multiplayer mode ￼
review_5: Please add a fight mode and multiplayer
